short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click and convert fiat prices to bitcoin on any webpage. Hold B + Click for bitcoin. S + Click for sats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click and convert fiat prices to bitcoin on any webpage. Hold B + Click for bitcoin. S + Click for sats. On twitter, Hold D + Click on any date to show the bitcoin price at that time.
